mapper.select:
select id songId,song_name songName,song_format songFormat,song_sz songSz, spell,song_order songOrder,lang_id langId,nature,scene,pixel, song_years songYears,theme_id themeId,classic_status classicStatus, type_id typeId,volume_one volumeOne,volume_two volumeTwo,strack, singer_id_one singerIdOne,singer_id_two singerIdTwo,singer_id_three singerIdThree, receiving_date receivinDate,ordertime,song_path songPath,song_info songInfo, DATE_FORMAT(song_version,'%Y-%m-%d') songVersion,path_level pathLevel from dbsongs where song_path!=''
and song_version>#{songVersion}
select id hotId,hot_id hotSongId,rank from dbhotsong
select id newId,new_id newSongId from dbnewsong
select id entId,type entName from dbtype
select id langId,language, rank langRank from dblang
select id themeId,theme from dbtheme
select version from dbSongImageVersion limit 0,1

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs WHERE dbsongs.id IN (SELECT song_id FROM dbuserfavorite where user_id=#{requestParams.userId}) limit #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbuserfavorite where user_id=#{requestParams.userId}
select singer_name from dbsinger where id=#{id}

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM dbsongs

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where dbsongs.id in(select new_id from dbnewsong) ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbnewsong

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where classic_status=1 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where classic_status=1

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbhotsong

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where theme_id=5 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where theme_id=5

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where theme_id=2 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where theme_id=2

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where lang_id=5 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where lang_id=5

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where lang_id=6 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where lang_id=6

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where lang_id=8 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where lang_id=8

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where lang_id=9 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where lang_id=9

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where lang_id=10 ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where lang_id=10

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where dbsongs.id in(select new_id from dbnewsong) and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where dbsongs.id in(select new_id from dbnewsong) and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where classic_status=1 and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where classic_status=1 and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where dbsongs.id in(select hot_id from dbhotsong) and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where dbsongs.id in(select hot_id from dbhotsong) and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where theme_id=5 and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where theme_id=5 and spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where spell like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') LIMIT 0,3

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three from dbsongs where spell like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT id,singer_name,header_path,song_count from dbsinger where dbsinger.song_count>0 and singer_pinyin like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') LIMIT 0,3
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where spell like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three from dbsongs where dbsongs.song_name like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT id,singer_name,header_path,song_count from dbsinger where dbsinger.song_count>0 and dbsinger.singer_name like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') LIMIT 0,3
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where dbsongs.song_name like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%')

SELECT id,singer_name,header_path,song_count from dbsinger where where dbsinger.song_count>0 and singer_name like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}

SELECT id,singer_name,header_path,song_count from dbsinger where where dbsinger.song_count>0 and singer_pinyin like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsinger where singer_name like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%')
SELECT count(*) from dbsinger where singer_pinyin like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where spell like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where spell like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where song_name like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%') ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) from dbsongs where song_name like concat(#{requestParams.content},'%')
SELECT id,song_name from dbhotsearch limit 0,#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT screen_name FROM dbsongsscreenfunction WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM dbsongs ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where dbsongs.id in(select new_id from dbnewsong) ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM dbsongs where dbsongs.id in(select new_id from dbnewsong) ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where classic_status=1
AND spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')
AND spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')
ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}

SELECT count(*) FROM dbsongs where classic_status=1
AND spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')
AND spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs
where spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')
where spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')
ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}

SELECT count(*) FROM dbsongs
where spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')
where spell like concat(#{requestParams.spell},'%')

SELECT dbsongs.id,dbsongs.song_name,dbsongs.singer_name,dbsongs.song_format song_model,dbsongs.ordertime,dbsongs.singer_id_one,dbsongs.singer_id_two,dbsongs.singer_id_three FROM dbsongs where FIND_IN_SET((select singer_name from dbsinger where id=#{requestParams.singerId}),dbsongs.singer_name) or dbsongs.singer_id_one=#{requestParams.singerId} or dbsongs.singer_id_two=#{requestParams.singerId} or dbsongs.singer_id_three=#{requestParams.singerId} ORDER BY dbsongs.ordertime DESC LIMIT #{requestParams.page},#{requestParams.dataNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM dbsongs where dbsongs.singer_id_one=#{requestParams.singerId} or dbsongs.singer_id_two=#{requestParams.singerId} or dbsongs.singer_id_three=#{requestParams.singerId}
